siteDescription: Surfing the world wide web for all front end dev insight
author: Gilberto Alejandro Haro

hero.altText: A visual representation of front-end development
hero.heroHeading: Exploring the World of Front-End Development
hero.heroDescription: It's mind-boggling how active the front-end development ecosystem has been. It feels like not so long ago I stumbled upon this world while needing a solution to market my photography services at the time. The variety of frameworks that have come, gone, and remained the most used before I even began my front-end journey is remarkable.
hero.heroSubdescription: This is where I compile some of my favorite discoveries and concepts.

intro.heading: A Remarkable Evolution
intro.content: The variety of frameworks that have come, gone, and remained the most used before I began even began my front-end journey is remarkable.

content.text: This is where I compile some of my favorite discoveries and concepts.

tech.heading: Syntax and Systems
tech.text: With many possible solutions for building modern web applications, developer experience could be considered like never before.
tech.listTitle: What I've been digging into this year:
